name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabIt - G Keep : Productivity in Access

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides quick access to Google Keep - right in browser action pop-up

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a quick access to Google Keep website. It opens as a pop-up window by clicking on the icon of the extension.
